== Vellookkara (CT) (627931) ==

Vellookkara (CT) is a town in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.92 sq. km. and harbouring 2122 households with total population of 8146 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 30 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 284 km. Male population is 3697 and female population is 4449. Scheduled Caste population is 1850 and Scheduled Tribes population is 46. Census Location Code of the town is 627931<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 60 km. Railway station is at Irinjalakuda at a distance of 4 km.
